name: Hostname traffic evolution
description: Verify that every domain has expected traffic based on pattern from previous weeks. If for any of the domains there is a large change in traffic, it could mean a measurement problem or problem with the website. A step-by-step guide for anomaly detection in Waaila can be found in the documentation.

constants.name: anomalyDetectionConfig
constants.description: Settings of the anomaly detection analysis

constants.name: minExpectedSessions
constants.description: minimal expected amount of sessions to be included in the results

blocks.description: Analyze presence of anomalies in sessions by hostname
blocks.failMessage: There was an anomaly in the ${valueColumnName}
